name: Bazooka Helicopter Shooting Sniper Game
description:
This bazooka helicopter shooting sniper game bring you back to severe world war, you are a fighting soldier against enemy and bring back peace to the world.
For thwarting enemy army movement, damage their force and power, you have an important mission, that is using bazooka shooting all movement enemy cars and helicopter, they all move their army to the war area. So you will damage enemy army force and power
This bazooka helicopter shooting sniper game is very interesting bazooka shooting sniper game with smooth controls and exciting game play. Just download and play this bazooka helicopter shooting sniper game

bazooka helicopter shooting sniper game feature
* Awesome FPS helicopter bazooka sniper shooting game engine
* Fantastic amazing background graphics
* Smooth controls
* Nice graphics helicopter
* Bullets camera so you can track of how the bazooka bullets goes

How to play bazooka helicopter shooting sniper game
This bazooka helicopter shooting sniper game is very easy to play but interesting much
* Tile the screen to aim enemy army helicopter
* Press on fire button and shooting all enemy army helicopter
